Name: Tharkad
Details:
The capital system of the Lyran Commonwealth and the seat of House Steiner. A frigid, arctic world, Tharkad is home to nearly 7 billion people. Governmental functions are carried out from the Triad, a sprawling complex that takes its name from its three most impressive structures: the Royal Court, the Royal Palace, and the Government House.

Due to its location in the interior of the Commonwealth, Tharkad has been left untouched by the Succession Wars.
